label: Danalock V3-BTZE
description: Z-Wave controlled door lock with Bluetooth Smart

paramInformation.label: Twin Assist
paramInformation.description: Helps you to lock and unlock your door lock.

paramInformation.label: Hold and Release
paramInformation.description: After a unlock operation the lock holds the lock, so the door can be opened

paramInformation.label: Block to block
paramInformation.description: The lock will run the motor until it hits resistance.

paramInformation.label: BLE Temporary Allowed
paramInformation.description: The BLE is enabled for a number of seconds.

paramInformation.label: Autolock
paramInformation.description: Lock after an unlock.Value is delay in sec before lock is locked again.
